item.title: Sensex and Nifty Slip Amid Mixed Sector Performance; Small Caps Show Resilience
item.description: The Indian equity markets closed the day with modest declines as the Sensex and Nifty indices edged lower, weighed down by sectoral weaknesses and a subdued market breadth. While large caps faced pressure, small caps demonstrated relative strength, supported by select stock performances and cautious investor sentiment ahead of global cues. Time: 48 minutes ago

item.title: Sensex and Nifty Slip Amid Mixed Sector Performance; Small Caps Show Resilience
item.description: The Indian equity markets closed the day with modest declines as the Sensex and Nifty edged lower, weighed down by sectoral weaknesses and a broader market breadth tilted towards declines. While large caps faced pressure, small caps demonstrated relative strength, supported by select sectoral gains and positive momentum in key stocks. Time: 1 hour ago
